title: US STOCKS-Futures point to higher open for Wall St
text:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks rallied on Friday, lifted by gains in technology stocks and a retreat in Treasury yields as the Federal Reserve eased concerns about the path of interest rate hikes this year. 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average .DJI rose 348.61 points, or 1.4 percent, to 25,311.09, the S&P 500 .SPX gained 43.44 points, or 1.61 percent, to 2,747.4 and the Nasdaq Composite .IXIC added 127.30 points, or 1.77 percent, to 7,337.39. 
Reporting by Chuck Mikolajczak; Editing by James Dalgleish
